Title: Xbox One Limited Edition Halo 5
Subtitle: Limited Edition 1TB console with custom Halo sound effects. Play and store more games, including your Xbox 360 games, with the 1TB hard drive. Design inspired by Spartan Locke and UNSC technology.
Description: Limited Edition 1TB console with custom Halo sound effects. Play and store more games, including your Xbox 360 games, with the 1TB hard drive. Design inspired by Spartan Locke and UNSC technology.

Title: Xbox One Elite Bundle
Subtitle: Play like a pro with the Xbox One Elite Bundle. Double your storage for games, including Xbox 360 titles, with the 1TB Solid State Hybrid Drive. Get to the action 20% faster from energy-save mode, so you can spend more time gaming. Then get pro-level precision with the Xbox Elite Wireless Controller, featuring an arsenal of swappable components, Hair Trigger Locks, and limitless customization with an easy-to-use app. Choose from a variety of thumbsticks, D-pads, and paddles for a tailored feel that provides game-changing accuracy and speed.

Title: Xbox One Forza Motorsport 6
Subtitle: Custom Xbox One Console with 1TB hard drive. This bundle includes Forza Motorsport 6 full game download. The only one where you can play Halo 5: Guardians, Rise of the Tomb Raider, and Forza Motorsport 6 this year
